title: Understanding SQL String Functions
text:
SQL string functions are used to manipulate and analyze string data. Common functions include:

- **CONCAT()**: Combines two or more strings into one.
- **LENGTH()**: Returns the length of a string.
- **SUBSTRING()**: Extracts a part of a string.

These functions are essential for handling text data in SQL databases.
